column5: You got to watch all 6.  The best ever.  Heres number 1 of 6.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Daj_mijJMCI&feature=related

john pinet is one of the funniest guys i know.the wife and i went to see him in Montreal this summer.laffed so hard i had cramps for a week. Look !!! Itsa fwee wiwwy!!!!  I relate to him, cause i love food too.except salad. salad isnt food.its a promissary note that food will follow.
That was an hour I enjoyed!
man has he ever lost a lot of weight

ya he was diagnosed with celiac disease, the intolerance to gluton. During his montreal tour he worked it into his routine. Do you know what kind of food has gluton in it...he asked. EVERYTHING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! he said with a panicked look on his face. hialarious man
